SEARCH
Package com.nhlstenden.Style

Class Style

java.lang.Object
com.nhlstenden.Style.Style
public class Style extends Object

main.com.nhlstenden.Style.Style is for Indent, Color, Font and Leading.

Direct relation between style-number and item-level: in main.com.nhlstenden.JabberPoint.Slide.Slide style if fetched for an item with style-number as item-level.
